overview: Aviel Tenenbaum (Avi) was appointed EVP Global Sales & Marketing in May 2008. Avi joined ECI in 2001 and prior to his current role served as the APAC RBU Manager. Before joining ECI, Avi held a number of senior management positions in the IT industry, and he brings with him over 18 years of business experience in international markets. Avi holds an MBA from Tel Aviv University and a BA in economics and East Asian Studies from The Hebrew University of Jerusalem.

relationships.title: Executive VP Global Sales and Marketing
